title: A three-dimensional solid additive suppresses non-radiative recombination loss to boost efficiency and scalability in organic photovoltaics
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03394A, Paper
Zhongjie Li, Lingling Zhan, Huayu Qiu, Xiaokang Sun, Hanlin Hu, Ruohua Gui, Hang Yin, Rui Sun, Jie Min, Jinyang Yu, Weifei Fu, Weiming Qiu, Zhi-Xi Liu, Shouchun Yin, Hongzheng Chen
The three-dimensional solid additive designed in this work reduces non-radiative recombination loss, achieving around 19% efficiency in PM6/Y6, over 19.6% in PM6/L8-BO and PM6/BTP-eC9 devices, and 16.23% in an 18.03 cm2 module.
